Add descriptive endings to hugo symbol names that do not have one already

Source: R/utils.R
dot-paste_endings.Rd

Add descriptive endings to hugo symbol names that do not have one already

Usage

.paste_endings(names, ending = NULL)

Arguments

names

hugo symbols to check

ending

character ending to add to hugo symbol names without descriptive endings. The default is ".mut". If interested in any type of alteration, use ".any".

Value

a vector of hugo symbols where each entry has a descriptive ending from the following list: ".Amp", ".Del", ".fus", ".cna", ".mut".
